Class PeerDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • ru.gui.PeerDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class PeerDisplay
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Very simple GUI to show all peers and their state (connected, choking, interested, etc)
    Author:
    Dylan Murray
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
